name: Metapulsar, Huang-long
effect:
(This card cannot be in your main deck)
[Stride](Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
(When this card strides, it gains the power and card name of one heart. At the end of the turn, return it face up)
[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 1] At the end of the battle that this unit attacked a vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a grade 1 or greater face up card from your bind zone, and put it into your hand or call it to (RC).

name: Chronojet Dragon G
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, for every two face up cards in your G zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and all of your <Zodiac Time Beast> rear-guards get [Power] +1000.
Time Leap-[AUTO](VC):During your turn, when your <Gear Dragon> or <Zodiac Time Beast> G unit [Stride], choose up to one card from your hand, call it to (RC), choose up to one of your rear-guards, and time leap it. (Bind it, call a grade +1 card from your deck, and shuffle your deck. At the end of the turn, put the called unit on the bottom of your deck, and call the bound card)

name: Chronofang Tiger G
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC)[Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):[Soul-Blast 1 & Choose one of your other rear-guards, and bind it face up] At the end of the battle that this unit attacked a vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and your opponent puts that unit on the bottom of his or her deck.

name: Steam Maiden, Imi
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC)[Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit may get grade -2 until end of turn.

name: Chronoclaw Monkey
effect: [AUTO][Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit is placed on (RC), if there is a <Zodiac Time Beast> on your (VC), you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Race of heart cards is included)

name: Chronobeat Buffalo
effect: [CONT](RC):If there is a grade 3 or greater <Zodiac Time Beast> on your (VC), this unit gets [Power] +2000. (Race of heart cards is included)

name: Iron Fist Sanction Colossus
effect: [AUTO][Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit intercepts ([Intercept]), this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Chronoethos Jackal
effect: [AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if there is a <Zodiac Time Beast> on your (VC), this unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle. (Race of heart cards is included)

name: Steam Sniper, Lishma
effect:
Time Leap-[AUTO](RC):[Soul-Blast 1 & Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] At the end of the battle that this unit boosted ([Boost]) a vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, time leap this unit. (Bind it, call a grade +1 card from your deck, and shuffle your deck. At the end of the turn, put the called unit on the bottom of your deck, and call the bound card)
[AUTO][Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit is placed on (RC) from your bind zone, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.

name: Chronocharge Unicorn
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your other <Zodiac Time Beast> units, and it gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Repel-circuit Dragon
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:[Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your units that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Chrono Dran G
effect:
[AUTO]:Forerunner (When a unit of the same clan rides this unit, you may call this unit to (RC))
[AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):[Put this unit into your soul] When your other unit is placed on (RC) other than from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one <Zodiac Time Beast> with the same grade as that unit, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Chronotherapy Hamster
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

name: Luckypot Dracokid
effect: [ACT](RC):[Put this unit into your soul] Choose up to one of your <Gear Chronicle>, and it gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.
